column3: Exactly as the display ticked over to 9.39 a.m. there was a distant banging on my front door. I hate show-offs.

9:39 A.M.
Braque was in the ground-floor women’s bathroom at Chapin Hall with her pants to her knees, but her whole day wasn’t f*cked yet. Yes, this was a substantial detour, but she still had an hour to make it to her last Micro 1 discussion group before the final.
